title: To bloom or not to bloom: That is the question

title_detail.value: To bloom or not to bloom: That is the question

summary: When spring is approaching, how do plants decide that it is time to flower? A team of plant scientists has unravelled a new mechanism to explain this seemingly easy, but actually complicated question.

summary_detail.value: When spring is approaching, how do plants decide that it is time to flower? A team of plant scientists has unravelled a new mechanism to explain this seemingly easy, but actually complicated question.
